name: Boomerang Kid
description:
(Browser Only)

Boomerang Kid 

A Short pixel game about a little dude who fights enemies 

Controls - 

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move -

 CLICK to fire boomerang, move MOUSE to aim

 Objectives 

- Avoid spikes, turret bullets, and slimes 

- Defeat Goblin King at the peak
